en_US.project_summary: Polychain Capital (Polychain) is an American investment firm based in San Francisco, California.The firm focuses on investments related to cryptocurrency and blockchain technology.

zh_CN.project_summary: Polychain Capital (Polychain) 是一家位于加利福尼亚旧金山的美国投资公司。该公司专注于与加密货币和区块链技术相关的投资。
